name: Demon Lord
description:
Demon Lord is a traditional text adventure. You tell the game what you want to do via a textual interface and the parser is based on verb / noun input.

Th upper half of the screen is used for illustrations and the lower half for the descriptive text and the input.

You control the last of the Knights of King Arthur's round table and the objective is to find and rescue the King and kill the Demon Lord who is holding him.

The game comes in two parts filling 96KB of RAM, the first part is Fortress of Fear, the second Forbidden Forest.
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
